title: Cooper Old Style
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171443/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171443/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Cooper Old Style**

Cooper Old Style was designed by [Oswald Bruce Cooper](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171443/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Oswald%20Bruce%20Cooper) in 1919. It is the older, but lesser known sibling of [Cooper Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171443/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cooper%20Black). Cooper was a student of [Frederic W. Goudy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414171443/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Frederic%20W.%20Goudy), and is evident in the very organic forms visible in Cooper's types.
author: Eric_West
